sentence.value: In addition, he was the Astronaut Office training coordinator, worked on various Department of Defense payloads, served as a spacecraft communicator (CAPCOM) at Mission Control for STS-41-D, STS-41-G, STS-51-A, STS-51-C and STS-51-D, worked Space Station issues for the Astronaut Office, and served as head of the Mission Development Branch within the Astronaut Office.

sentence.value: This eight-day mission culminated in a landing at Edwards Air Force Base, California, on January 30, 1992.
sentence.annotated-sentence: This eight-day mission culminated in [[a landing|Amphibious_warfare]] at [[Edwards Air Force Base|Edwards_Air_Force_Base]], [[California|California]], on [[January|January]] 30, 1992.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: This eight-day mission culminated in a landing at Edwards Air Force Base, California, on January 30, 1992.
